body:
Hey, check out the new stuff on the website on the homepage and under the Competitive tab in the navigation bar!

Note: Right now a slot only facilitates a single team. In the future we will allow inviting other teams to join.
body_tagged:
Hey, check out the new stuff on the website on the homepage and under the Competitive tab in the navigation bar!

Note: Right now a slot only facilitates a single team. In the future we will allow inviting other teams to join.
title: Website Tournament and Scrim Update

reply_to.body: Nice, how do you find the scrimmage server IP though?
reply_to.body_tagged: Nice, how do you find the scrimmage server IP though?

replies.body: It gives you the server name that you rent... so if you rent the time for Scrim02, you do /server scrim02 or scrim02.avic.us.
replies.body_tagged: It gives you the server name that you rent... so if you rent the time for Scrim02, you do /server scrim02 or scrim02.avic.us.

replies.body: Also note that the server slots are also subject to change as the community sees fit, we welcome your suggestions here.
replies.body_tagged: Also note that the server slots are also subject to change as the community sees fit, we welcome your suggestions here.

replies.body:
Wait, so no team vs team for now?
What do you mean by, "Right now a slot only facilitates a single team. In the future we will allow inviting other teams to join".
replies.body_tagged:
Wait, so no team vs team for now?
What do you mean by, "Right now a slot only facilitates a single team. In the future we will allow inviting other teams to join".

reply_to.body: Also note that the server slots are also subject to change as the community sees fit, we welcome your suggestions here.
reply_to.body_tagged: Also note that the server slots are also subject to change as the community sees fit, we welcome your suggestions here.

replies.body: Correct. The scrim servers are in alpha basically, so we're limiting the use to one team per slot for now.
replies.body_tagged: Correct. The scrim servers are in alpha basically, so we're limiting the use to one team per slot for now.
